overview: Prepared by the team of the Program for Training Black Researchers, The video brings together images and voices that talk about the reproductive health of black women, diseases taking into account the racial/ethnic background, habits, customs, the physical and social environment and the inhuman conditions imposed by racism.

production_companies.name: Centro Brasileiro de Análise e Planejamento (CEBRAP)

title: Eu, Mulher Negra
